          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določi Wk(x) pri vlečenju žoge</string>
            <string language="en">Drag the Ball to Determine PE(x)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schleppen Sie die Kugel, um PE(x) festzustellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traînez la boule pour déterminer PE(x)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arraste a esfera para determinar PE(x)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trascini la sfera per determinare PE(x)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σέρετε τη σφαίρα για να καθορίσετε το PE (X)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arrastre la bola para determinar PE(x)</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Merjenje potencialne energije žoge s pomočjo kinetične energije.</string>
            <string language="en">Measuring potencial energy of the ball with its known kinetic energy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">potencialna energija</string>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">energija</string>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messende potencial Energie der Kugel mit seiner 
bekannten kinetischen Energie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie potencial de mesure de la boule avec de 
la sa énergie cinétique connue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia potencial de medição da esfera com sua 
energia cinética sabida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia potencial di misurazione della sfera con 
la relativa energia cinetica conosciuta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της potencial ενέργειας της σφαίρας με τη 
γνωστή κινητική ενέργειά του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía potencial que mide de la bola con su 
energía cinética sabida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
